title: PriceWatch: Forecasting and Observability
summary: Python service that scrapes Amazon prices, forecasts trends, and streams metrics to Grafana.
problem: Teams lacked a reliable view of multi-category Amazon price movements and near real-time insights.
approach: Built a modular pipeline to fetch product prices, forecast trends, and push metrics to Grafana; deployed on GCP Cloud Run.
impact: Monitored 1K products and handled ~500K daily requests, enabling timely pricing reviews and alerts.

title: RideView SF: Taxi Flow Explorer
summary: Streamlit app with 3D PyDeck heatmap, filters, and downloads for San Francisco taxi data.
problem: Urban planners needed ad-hoc exploration of taxi flows with low-latency filtering.
approach: Implemented PyDeck heatmaps, caching, and async pulls, with exportable filtered datasets.
impact: Reduced query wait time by ~60%, improving planning workflows and data accessibility.

title: Police Stops Analysis Dashboard
summary: Dashboard for outcome, search rate, and significance exploration on 280K+ Vermont stops.
problem: Reporters and researchers needed transparent analytics and statistical tests on stops data.
approach: Cleaned and modeled data; added Veil of Darkness test, confidence intervals, and p-value annotations.
impact: Enabled one-click exports and clearer statistical context for public reporting.

title: IPO Underperformance Prediction
summary: Built ANN, SVM, and ensemble models to predict underperforming IPOs.
problem: Analysts needed an early signal for IPOs likely to underperform.
approach: Engineered features and compared models; delivered scenario forecasts.
impact: Achieved ~68% accuracy and provided interpretable outputs for decision support.
